short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Choose different Reddit UIs according to your needs (including Old UI, New UI, SH UI)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Redirect all Reddit links to the version of your chosen interface.

including: old.reddit.com / new.reddit.com / sh.reddit.com

The extension supports images, live and shared links seamlessly.

Please note: The data access notice displayed on all reddit.com sites is automatically generated by the extension's operation on every tab. No personal information is required for its proper functioning.
